name: Pictionary Air
description:
Draw on Air, see it on your device and mirror to the TV in this hysterical new way to play Pictionary™, the classic family drawing game.

Use the special Pictionary Air™ pen (sold separately) to draw in the air while the app tracks and displays the sketch. Become part of the action as you interact with your sketch, like charades, while your team tries to guess as many clues as they can before time is up!

The app will track your scores, time the game and set the rounds for easy-to-use gameplay. You can also save, edit and share videos of all your funny gameplay moments!

Use an Apple TV to mirror the game to your TV!


There are two game modes:
- Play mode lets you choose the length and number of rounds.
- Selfie mode lets you sketch your Air masterpiece without a timer.


Pictionary Air™ is the hilarious new addition to your game night.
